attributes.action: Stop any potential mining for Minerals in and around the Sperrin Mountains
attributes.additional_details: Australian mining company Walkabout Resources has said it has made "very exciting" discoveries while searching for gold and other precious metals in Slieve Gallion" - Belfast Telegraph
attributes.background: Australian Mining Companies want to possibly start mining our mountains for minerals such as gold, silver and much more.  This will rip our mountains apart & destroy our environment, if they find traces of gold they will follow it - even if it runs under your home!! And you wont get a penny!!!
